Articles.Content:
I recently collected over 100 beautiful space photos for my desktop wallpaper file because I love having a large pool to draw from and not knowing what background might be coming next. It will be even better for you all since I have seen every one a few times before I put it in the wallpaper file. I feel it is a good mix of old spacecraft, including lots of great old concept drawings from the early days (generally framed in white boxes to make them look and fit nice), modern spacecraft, and future spacecraft, along with beautiful planets and moons of the solar system and other celestial bodies. Every image that I decided to include, I looked around to make sure I found the highest quality version, then resized and cropped to try and keep that quality as often best possible. I'll probably continue to add more as time goes by but this is a pretty good set so far. I've tried to include some of everything here but let me know if you think I've left something crucial out. Not too many rocket launches sadly, as they are almost always in the portrait orientation don't fit well horizontally on a screen without leaving big empty areas on the sides. Here it is!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1l17wyoth3vzhsw/Space.zip?dl=0

Here is a small selection of the kind of stuff I've included:
